snippet: Champions Leicester City are still the team to beat in the Premier League despite their sluggish start to the campaign but need to string together a series of wins to rebuild their confidence, defender Luis Hernandez said....

headline.main: Foxes Still Hunted Despite Poor Start, Says Hernandez
headline.print_headline: Foxes Still Hunted Despite Poor Start, Says Hernandez

lead_paragraph: Champions Leicester City are still the team to beat in the Premier League despite their sluggish start to the campaign but need to string together a series of wins to rebuild their confidence, defender Luis Hernandez said.

headline.main: Mourinho Sent Off as United Draw Again at Old Trafford
headline.print_headline: Mourinho Sent Off as United Draw Again at Old Trafford

snippet: West Bromwich Albion manager Tony Pulis said on Friday he was disappointed to have lost a High Court battle last week after being ordered to pay 3.7 million pounds to his former club Crystal Palace in a dispute over the way he left....

headline.main: West Brom's Pulis Disappointed With High Court Verdict
headline.print_headline: West Brom's Pulis Disappointed With High Court Verdict

lead_paragraph: West Bromwich Albion manager Tony Pulis said on Friday he was disappointed to have lost a High Court battle last week after being ordered to pay 3.7 million pounds to his former club Crystal Palace in a dispute over the way he left.

snippet: Chelsea's ability to grind out victories will make it very difficult for anyone to catch them in the Premier League, Manchester United manager Jose Mourinho has said....

headline.main: Mourinho Admits Its Chelsea's Title to Lose
headline.print_headline: Mourinho Admits Its Chelsea's Title to Lose

lead_paragraph: Chelsea's ability to grind out victories will make it very difficult for anyone to catch them in the Premier League, Manchester United manager Jose Mourinho has said.

snippet: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola is struggling to impose his possession-based style of play on the team as the ball is rarely on the ground but is confident he will find a solution....

headline.main: Guardiola Willing to Adapt to Find Winning Formula at Man City
headline.print_headline: Guardiola Willing to Adapt to Find Winning Formula at Man City

lead_paragraph: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola is struggling to impose his possession-based style of play on the team as the ball is rarely on the ground but is confident he will find a solution.

snippet: - Adam Lallana scored twice as Liverpool returned to second in the Premier League with a 3-0 victory over Middlesbrough on Wednesday that revived their title push....

headline.main: Lallana at the Double as Liverpool Down Boro
headline.print_headline: Lallana at the Double as Liverpool Down Boro

lead_paragraph: - Adam Lallana scored twice as Liverpool returned to second in the Premier League with a 3-0 victory over Middlesbrough on Wednesday that revived their title push.

snippet: Antonio Conte reckoned his high-flying Chelsea would enjoy a very merry Christmas after ensuring they would go into the festive period top of the Premier League with a 10th straight victory on Wednesday....

headline.main: Conte Says It Will Be a Happy Xmas for High-Flying Chelsea
headline.print_headline: Conte Says It Will Be a Happy Xmas for High-Flying Chelsea

lead_paragraph: Antonio Conte reckoned his high-flying Chelsea would enjoy a very merry Christmas after ensuring they would go into the festive period top of the Premier League with a 10th straight victory on Wednesday.

snippet: Full back Seamus Coleman is hoping Everton can maintain their unbeaten run at Goodison Park to leapfrog Manchester United with a victory over their Premier League opponents on Sunday....

headline.main: Coleman Hopes Home Comforts Can Lift Everton Past United
headline.print_headline: Coleman Hopes Home Comforts Can Lift Everton Past United

lead_paragraph: Full back Seamus Coleman is hoping Everton can maintain their unbeaten run at Goodison Park to leapfrog Manchester United with a victory over their Premier League opponents on Sunday.
